promotion_progress_wrapper.remaining_minimum_order_value: Unlock Your Deal! Spend {amount} more to activate this promotion.
promotion_progress_wrapper.fulfilled_promotion_condition: You've unlocked a special offer! Add eligible products to your cart to enjoy the benefits.
promotion_progress_wrapper.partial_savings: Nice work! You've unlocked a deal and saved {amount}. Keep shopping to unlock even more.
promotion_progress_wrapper.full_savings: Great job! You’ve unlocked the full deal and saved {amount}.
promotion_progress_wrapper.free_gift_unlocked: Great job! You’ve unlocked a free gift.
promotion_progress_wrapper.combo_deal_unlocked: Great job! You’ve unlocked the full deal and saved {amount}.
promotion_progress_wrapper.combo_deal: Unlock your deal! Add eligible products to your cart to enjoy the offer.

promotion_slide_in.headline: Your Deals

profile_password_management.title: Password Management
profile_password_management.description: Keep your account secure by updating your password regularly.
profile_password_management.idp_description: Your account is secured through an external login provider, so changing your password here isn’t necessary. To update your password, please visit your login provider’s settings.
profile_password_management.success_message: Your password has been successfully updated.

error.401_unauthorized: Your request could not be processed, please try again.
error.403_forbidden: Your password couldn’t be updated. Please check your current password and try again.

shipping_return_heading.title: Shipping and return
shipping_return_heading.general_info: The postage for shipping and returning articles, as well as the packaging costs, will be covered by SCAYLE. Orders with multiple products may result in partial deliveries.
shipping_return_heading.dhl_paragraph: Immediately available items are usually delivered by DHL within 1-3 business days.
shipping_return_heading.hermes_paragraph: Immediately available items are usually delivered by Hermes within 1-3 business days.
shipping_return_heading.return_information: If the return label is missing from your delivery, you can request a new one from our customer service at any time.
